sentences.en: A competitor shall never use or wear on his person more than one handgun.
sentences.cn: 选手不得使用或配着超过一把枪.

sentences.en: One of the criminals immediately shoved a .38 caliber handgun to my head, ordered me to the cooler, pushed me down on the floor, and pumped a bullet into the back of my head - execution style.
sentences.cn: 其中一个匪徒迅速掏出一把口径为38毫米的手枪用力指著我的头，勒令我走到冷冻机旁，然后把我推倒在地，像执行死刑般从后面朝我头部开了一枪。

sentences.en: Other starting positions for the handgun may be stipulated in the written stage briefing.
sentences.cn: 其它关于预备姿势的限制将规定于书面的关卡演示文稿中.

sentences.en: Police recovered an illegal handgun from the car, initially raising questions about whether Mr. Duggan had fired on one of the officers.
sentences.cn: 警方从那辆出租车里找回一支非法手枪，曾一开始令外界怀疑杜干是否曾向一名警察开枪。

sentences.en: Stumbling through the smoke, the pilot emerged from the forward compartment, fumbled for the handgun at his belt.
sentences.cn: 烟雾间出现了飞行员跌跌撞撞的身影，他的手笨拙地摸索着腰带上的手枪。

sentences.en: They began to tussle with each other for the handgun.
sentences.cn: 他们互相扭打起来,抢夺那支手枪。

sentences.en: They were yesterday convicted of illegally using a handgun.
sentences.cn: 他们昨天被判犯有非法使用手枪罪。

trans.tran_en: a small gun that you hold in one hand when you fire it
